title: Safe
summaries: The Safe is a portable storage item with 40 slots to store other items. The Safe, Piggy Bank, Defender's Forge, and Void Vault have the unique ability to be carried while they contain items. It is purchased from the Merchant for 20 each, after Skeletron has been defeated.
The Safe functions identically to the Piggy Bank, besides it can be placed on <linked>platform</linked> or <linked>furniture</linked> surface, it can also be placed on <linked>Blocks</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Can be used to store your items
Stored items can only be accessed by you
statistics.Buy: 20
statistics.Sell: 4
